entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.Pipelines.Pipe.ReadAsync fails to cancel on CancellationToken #58909
  • BenchmarkDotNet has failed to build the auto-generated boilerplate code in wasm configurations #58906
  • [libraries][Linux] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.CreateSocket.CtorAndAccept_SocketNotKeptAliveViaInheritance Timed out #58903
  • Test failure: Interop\PInvoke\Vector2_3_4\Vector2_3_4\Vector2_3_4.dll #58899
    6.0.0
  • SendPacketsElement_FileStreamMultiPartMixed_MultipleFileStreams_Success failed on windows.11.amd64.clientpre.open #58898
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsSIMD(user) && (returnType == user->TypeGet())' #58897
    6.0.0
  • different publish behavior between visual studio 2019 and 2022 #58894
  • [Long Running Test] pauseonstart.sh #58893
  • Linq XElement.Add adds text "None" into XML #58890
  • .NET 6.0 Model Validation #58886
  • [API Proposal]: HMAC Interface #58882
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: [RegexGenerator(...)] attribute #58880
    7.0.0
  • Source Generator projects don't need to be included in other library's sln files #58879
    7.0.0
  • JIT still seems to be hoisting some modified indirs #58877
    7.0.0
  • JIT uses too wide reads for small returned structs #58874
    7.0.0
  • Process class leaks pipes on MacOS when redirecting stdout and stderr #58872
  • System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Validator.TryValidateObject does not work with ICustomTypeDescriptor #58867
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' when compiling SSE heavy code targeting ARM64 #58861
    7.0.0
  • Please provide MSI installer for .Net5 #58859
  • question about jit code on mono interal call case crash. #58858
    Future
  • TextFieldParser does correctly handle input from streams that don't fill out the full array provided. #58857
  • ResourceManager.GetResourceSet returns different results if GetString is used #58855
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Vector2.Equals doesn't use float.Equals in Equals implementation #58853
    7.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21454.3] Cannot create instance of type 'Sentry.Dsn' when launch just-an-email #58852
  • [System.Net.Quic]Mapping of QUIC_ADDR is incorrect on macOS #58849
  • [API Proposal]: Rename misleading members of TimeSpan #58848

Closed

  • System.Collections - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58661
    6.0.0
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58657
    6.0.0
  • System.Configuration - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58660
    6.0.0
  • System.Text - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58665
    6.0.0
  • VM6:1 Uncaught pause_on_uncaught exception in visual studio 2022 version 6.0.0 Preview 7 #58509
    7.0.0
  • VS Blazor Wasm Debugging Crashes #58667
    7.0.0
  • Certificate SHA1withRSA encryption method dotnet Framework and dotnet core calculation results are inconsistent #58705
    Future
  • New X509Chain status code "DuplicateExtension" in Monterey beta 8 #58833
  • .NET 6 preview 7 Blazor - Mobile device - Streaming compilation failed. Falling back to ArrayBuffer instantiation. RangeError: WebAssembly.instantiate(): Out of memory: wasm memory #58569
    6.0.0
  • Maybe spin-waits in the thread pool can be tuned better for arm/arm64 #39559
    7.0.0
  • Make all SendAsync methods virtual #58647
    7.0.0
  • [.NET 5] Issue with SocketsHttpHandler & TLS 1.3 #58439
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'block->countOfInEdges() > 0' during 'Remove empty finally' with infinite loop in finally #58729
    6.0.0
  • Blazor AOT compilation runs out of memory, is extremely slow, results in a giant website #58792
    7.0.0
  • H/2 stress many failure in content posting methods #55261
    6.0.0
  • Safe handle use after close in System.Net.Security.Tests #46770
    7.0.0
  • ClientAndServer_OneOrBothUseDefault_Ok failed in CI with ObjectDisposedException #30724
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6: when format a number with '$', the display position is strange. #58876
  • [mono][aot] `.aotdata` files size increase compared to _legacy_ mono #57689
    7.0.0
  • Mobile runtimeconfig.json support #49237
    7.0.0
  • JObject Support #58856
  • Validator does not validate annotated fields of a record type in .Net 6 #58839
  • Test failure NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #58847
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' #57752
    7.0.0
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] UnmanagedCallersOnlyTest fails. #57915
    6.0.0
  • Create a new test, instead of adding runtimeconfig.json to the existing Android functional test #50905
    7.0.0
  • DOTNET_ROLL_FORWARD=Major ignores in new builds of .net 6 since preview 7 #58837
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] Assertion failed '!genIsValidFloatReg(reg) Generate code' #57911
    7.0.0
  • Vector256<Byte.WithElement(1235410822): RunBasicScenario failed to throw ArgumentOutOfRangeException. #58295
    6.0.0
  • System.CodeDom - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58663
    6.0.0
  • DacDbiArrayList<T>::Dealloc() released the memory through the wrong allocator #57577
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SIMD temp register interference #58914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #58913
    area-Build-mono
  • Support JsonExtensionData in STJ source-gen #58912
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58911
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Clear cache after don't stop in a conditional breakpoint #58910
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Clear cache after don't stop in a conditional breakpoint #58908
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimize `StringBuilder` by embracing spans and `ISpanFormattable` more. #58907
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Fix circular dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58905
  • [wasm] Fix circular dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix publishing symbols for `dotnet` and `hostpolicy` #58902
    area-Host, 6.0.0
  • Fix Type.GetTypeFromHandle nullable annotation #58901
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] fix local build for NetCoreServer and RemoteLoopServer #58900
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • documentation for HttpRequestOptions #58896
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix pause on exception behavior #58895
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add crossgen2 runs for x86 (#58053) #58892
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add info about .NET 6 compatibility with Intel CET shadow stacks and how to try it #58891
    documentation, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Ignore the DuplicateExtension status from macOS 12. #58889
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Add delete operator in Crst class #58885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Allow uses of pthread_condattr_setclock on Apple and Android #58884
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Consider finally that jumps to itself as non-empty #58881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] Unify BuildWasmRuntimes target and use cmake #58878
    area-Build-mono
  • Add typeparam docs to interpolated string handler AppendFormatted methods #58875
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • Use less calls for MoveDirectory #58869
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use separate VNs for DBL2INT_OVF helpers #58868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Create and publish missing symbols #58866
  • Turn on the mobile device telemetry (XHarness workloads) #58864
  • [release/6.0] [MonoVM] Report original DLL name when P/Invoke lookup fails #58863
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [WIP] [HTTP/3] Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Allow users passing FILE_FLAG_BACKUP_SEMANTICS as FileOptions #58854
    area-System.IO
  • Enhance: BackgroundService blocked the execution of whole host #58851
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Enable more iOS device tests #58846
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58641
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Skip dead conditions in eventpipe srcgen #58871
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add W11 test queue #58570
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix publishing symbols for `dotnet` and `hostpolicy` #58844
    area-Host
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix pause on exception behavior #58728
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix incorrect SIMD temp allocation for Vector256 with AVX2 disabled #58850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs #58417
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ignore the DuplicateExtension status from macOS 12. #58834
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Request fewer threads in the thread pool #57885
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Deallocate resources for DacDbiArrayList with a matching deallocator #58791
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Port fixes for perf pipeline from main branch #58843
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Change PKCS12 password to assist with credscan #58807
    area-System.Security, test enhancement, community-contribution
  • Consider finally that jumps to itself as non-empty #58771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • only cache credentials on success #58594
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/6.0] Fix Windows 8 detection in Pbkdf2 #58823
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Add explicit APIs to Double/Single/Half/TimeOnly #58845
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/6.0] Use non-deprecated Android Helix queue #58862
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • Use XHarnessApkToTest to create helix work items for runtime tests when running on Android #57292
    area-Infrastructure
  • [MonoVM] Report original DLL name when P/Invoke lookup fails #58206
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • System.Net.Ping: Skip TimeoutIsRespected test if network is unreachable #58745
    area-System.Net
  • [build] Bump XHarness version #58830
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use non-deprecated Android Helix queue #58809
  • [wasm] WebSocket perf test #58730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix x86 EH for UnmanagedCallersOnly methods #58796
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix reporting of live var ranges after callf+always pairs #58815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a separate RuntimeConfig test for Android and add incremental build #58835
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Always write sample events in EventPipe based on sample frequency. #58720
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Remove dead code #58475
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #58410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect SIMD temp allocation for Vector256 with AVX2 disabled #58820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms #58558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Address Windows recommendations for Link APIs #58592
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add `JitEnregStats` complus. #58776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.9 and v4.0 #58446
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58836
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add cast when replacing promoted struct with field in lowering #58589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Fix ro segments with regions #58811
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add JitStress=1/2 runs to jitstress-isas-x86 pipeline #58822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [IGNORE] trying to use build publish items directly #58780
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Support aot without trimming #58306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst and test fixes for Android #58841
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • [tvOS] Be less eager in creating the non-existent special folders #58788
    area-System.IO, os-tvos, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Make Float-to-Integer conversions compatible with x86 #58831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • LoggerMessage formatter performance improvements #58524
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Align preallocationSize behavior #58726
    area-System.IO
  • [tasks] [net472] Add ProjectReferences to JsonToItemsTaskFactory #58825
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Remove MonoAssemblyContextKind MONO_ASMCTX_ enum #58802
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Update libraries helix matrix #58637
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable global constant propagation for small types #57726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Move Android SDK logic to /eng #58700
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable test parallelization in installer tests #58604
    area-HostModel
  • Add perfmap debug directory entry to crossgen2 output as needed #58552
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • F# printf with parameters causes MissingRuntimeArtifactException in Native binary #1542
  • Replace remaining SRM regex usage of Tuple with ValueTuples #1540
  • Move SRM regex DGML code to be DEBUG only #1539
  • Document SRM regex approach/algorithms/terminology in README.md #1538
  • Audit SRM regex code for unbounded recursion #1537
  • Decide what to do with SRM regex Deserialize/Serialize #1536
  • NativeAOT: dwarfdump --verify produces thousands of warnings and errors #1535

Closed

  • Assembly.GetEntryAssembly crashes instead of returning null with shared library and CGO consumer #1545

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement ComWrappers.RegisterForTrackerSupport to be able create CCW #1544
  • Move code around in Regex SRM #1543

Merged

  • Fix null reference exception in library mode #1546
  • More cleanup for Regex SRM #1541

Updated

  • Compile NativeAOT on x86 #1531

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support URL's in workload update's --from-rollback-file parameter #20879
  • Make inheritdoc the default comment specification for interface and override methods #20858
  • Intermittent Workload CLI errors: 'Number of entries expected in End of Central Directory...' #20849
  • dotnet watch verbose started does not show arguments #20843
  • Segmentation fault .NET core 5.0 #20842
  • After upgrade from net6 rc1 to rc2, the setup failed. #20834
  • After Install 6.0 RC1 on Mac OS, install wasm-tools workload via Terminal met an error "Workload installation failed". #20833
  • windows arm64 dotnet SDK fails to publish self-contained #20840

Closed

  • With .NET 6 RC2 SDK, Create projects failed due to lacking '/usr/share/dotnet/sdk-manifests' when using .deb and .rpm installers #20836

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/6.0.1xx with rc1 #20877
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix workload pack records serialization #20876
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove MMI dependency #20867
    Area-Workloads
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.4xx #20865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.3xx #20864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.2xx #20863
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pass in position to .GetSuggestions() #20852
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1352196 #20851
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Report args in dotnet watch ProcessRunner #20844
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1351740 #20841
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Revert "Revert "Ensure the server and client are valid when sending / receiving hot reload messages"" #20874
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Release 6.0.1xx] [PackageValidation] Improve warnings about references when running PackageValidation in a project after packaging it. #20822
    Servicing-consider, Area-Compatibility
  • Add self contained short flag #19681
  • Do not specify a protocol if server does not require secrets #20577
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [main] Add targeting pack VS.Redist dependencies #20792
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add targeting pack VS.Redist dependencies #20791
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use 1ES build pools #20644
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Fix duplicate entries in blazor.boot.json manifest extensions (#20602) #20850
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Fix duplicate entries in blazor.boot.json manifest extensions #20602
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Respect BlazorWebAssemblyLoadAllGlobalizationData in hosted projects during publish (#20800) #20835
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [release/3.1.1xx] Remove blob feeds #20553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads
  • Blazor AOT Cache Busting #20630
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Proposal: Implicit "select" #593

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086
    Working Set
  • Open issue: non-negative assumption should apply to both Count and Length #5137

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate allocation-free iteration of Symbol.Locations #56306
  • Investigate use of MemoryMappedFile after disposal #56305
  • null reference in RemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider #56304
  • Missing definite assignment error for complex "is" checks #56298
  • Add C# code fix/refactor for new set of 'minimal' API surface areas #56283
  • Contract failed in FindUsages.AbstractFindUsagesService.FindReferencesProgressAdapter.OnReferenceFoundAsync #56274

Closed

  • Bug in IntelliSense xml file generation causing DocIds of unusual APIs to show up malformed #56302
  • AV from DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader #56195
    17.0
  • Type inference handles `null` and `default` for reference types differently #43536
    17.1
  • Get Generate code compilation error before calling AddSource #56294
  • CSharpUseRangeOperatorDiagnosticAnalyzer should handle Substring(0, index) #56269
  • NRE in SymbolEquivalenceComparer.EquivalenceVisitor.HandleTupleTypes #56295
  • Feature 'Find usages' is currently unavailable due to an internal error: An item with the same key has already been added. #55955
    17.0
  • Relax CS8350 when passed ref-parameter are created in the same stack frame #43591
  • Html.DisplayFor use null conditional operator ?. #56062
  • String concatenation is incorrect in .net 6 preview 7 #56246
  • Add DateTimeProvider to Incremental Source Generator API #56212
  • When a C# compiler unit-test is executed after a compiler change in Roslyn solution, the test is executed against old compiler bits #56219
  • Add new item class file formats file-scoped namespace incorrectly #56279
    17.0.P4
  • The 17th parameter of a synthesized delegate doesn't have ref information encoded #55570
    17.0
  • Make the external sources node available in design mode as well. #55946
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Move semantic classification caching down to Editor layer #56310
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56309
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Read StorageOptions from solution snapshot. #56307
    Area-IDE
  • Control exposure of tuple fields #56293
    Area-Compilers
  • Completion service workspace #56291
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Correctly report the missing member #56287
    Area-Compilers
  • Unify code for pragma placements #56285
    Area-IDE
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Refactor code to simpler implementation using `_pool.ToListAndFree(..)` #56277
    Area-Compilers
  • Interpolated string handler IOperation support #56276
    Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56308
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use 'is not' pattern #56303
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Report syntax error from Hot Reload service #56275
    Area-Interactive, 17.0
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56299
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Eliminate 75GB allocations during binding in a performance trace #56218
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Options persistent storage #56237
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix access violation when MemoryMappedFile is disposed #56255
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow null literals to contribute nullability to type inference #56022
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Increase the number of cases that 'use range operator' detects #56296
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56203
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main into RawStringLiterals #56297
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56301
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56292
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Null annotate preview generation #56258
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable NRT in another project. #56273
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Set analyzers `global_level` to `-99`. #55472
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56288
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle projects added during break state #56266
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Improve the signature display when a tuple appears many times within it. #56025
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56286
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56284
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Expose C# formatting service to Razor via external access #56251
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56282
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56281
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56271
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56272
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56270
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge all source generator state in CompilationTracker into a helper type. #56229
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Include ref info for parameters > 16 in synthesized delegate type name #56233
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Fix crash in FindReferences #56265
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56312
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56311
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Improve the tooltip of Inheritance Margin #56026
    Area-IDE
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Use SpillSequences when appropriate instead of Sequences #56153
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers
  • Prototype of how to potentially add `using alias = type` to the language. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Move VS lsp client implementation to EditorFeatures for VSMac #56051
    Area-IDE
  • Infer delegate type from lambda expression with explicit return statements #56236
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Add ISymbol.MetadataToken #55913
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core MVC : UrlHelper.Action fail to resolve when mixing nullable route value and query string parameters #36352
  • Why are there so many using statements when using the extract to file option? #36348

    Backlog
  • Startup regression: endpoint, https, plaintext #36323
  • Prevent CSS039 Unexpected character sequence in property value. #36321
    17.0-Preview5
  • Can we remove the MapToDocumentEdits call in Razor On Type formatting? #36319
    Next sprint planning
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET Core 3.1 Release, validation-aspnetcore-.NET Core 3.1 Release, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-107590-.NETCore3.1Release #36318

  • models list validation return display name #36312
  • [Blazor-wasm] multi-threading support via workers. #36311

Closed

  • Hot Reload: Adding a code block at runtime does not get hot reloaded, even refreshing the browser doesn't show the change. #34465
    6.0-rc2
  • Circular dependency error when publishing webdeploy package using .net 5.0.300 #35134
  • Quarantining `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.FunctionalTests.LinkedApplicationTests.LinkedApplicationWorks` #35977

  • Startup improvement: fortunes #36295

  • Upgrade to the latest Bootstrap version #19225

  • HttpLoggingMiddleware is overly aggressive at redacting headers #36156

  • Blazor WASM: Publish from MSBuild does not create wwwroot\_framework folder #29626

  • minimal API - Package template #34010

  • Add `.cshtml.css` styles in default project templates #31030

  • Kestrel certificate with docker-compose: BIO routines:BIO_new_file:no such file #36211
  • DotNetStreamReference class no longer exists #36316
  • Loading session state asynchronously - potential usage problem #27733
    6.0-rc2
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly: Deadlock when retrying a "503 - Service unavailable" #28384
    6.0-rc2
  • Run Blazor Server app using dotnet watch, the second counter loses its state(resets count to 0) when IncrementAmount attribute is added to the first counter. #36299
  • [Question] How to call .UseSystemd() in the new (.NET 6 preview 7) minimal templates #36324
  • Single file build time regression: proxy-yarp #36136
  • Startup regression: endpoint, fortunes #36212
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef, updates #36216
  • Startup regression: json #36263
  • Visual Studio IDE hangs on CSHTML edit #27666
    17.0-Preview5

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] [WinUI] Updating Grid Margin followed by Padding causes Layout cycle error, crashes app. #2444
  • [Bug] Updating existing elements margin via code-behind does not update views. #2443
  • [Bug] [Android] WebView Not Filling Contents of RefreshView unless Width or HeightRequested set. #2442
  • [Bug] [WinUI] RefreshView throws Null Reference Exception for Dispatcher when initialized. #2441
  • [Bug] [Android] Null Reference Exception when using RefreshView if RefreshColor not set. #2439
  • [Bug] Analyzer Errors in generated code #2438
  • [Bug] Multiple reports of templates missing from Visual Studio 2022 latest preview #2436
  • [Bug] [WinUI] Navigation Page has no back button. #2435
  • [Bug] [Android] OnAppearing not called when using Page navigation. #2434
  • [Enhancement] Add ONLY in-code layout creation (or easiest from code) #2433
  • [Bug] MPNowPlayingInfoCenter.default.playbackState not mapped #2429

Closed

  • [Bug] ViewCell does not support direct content #2437

PullRequests

Created

  • [vs-insertion] Push packs to "shipping" feed #2440
  • Android TabbedPageHandler #2432
  • [Android] Clean up a little bit WebView #2431

Merged

  • Fix template ApplicationTitle variable to have correct substitution #2427
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2428
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Handlers] Add IndicatorView handler for iOS and Android #2038
  • [ci] Pass SkiaSharp extras to symbol archiving #2426
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
  • Add single file analyzer to maui project #2414
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
  • Shadow Support #570
    6.0.100-rc.1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expression of type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.SingleQueryingEnumerable`1[System.Boolean]' cannot be used for return type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[System.Object]' #25958
  • EF Core produces a duplicate SELECT statement #25955
  • [EFCore 6.0] [Firebird] Problem with test NorthwindMiscellaneousQueryTestBase.Entity_equality_on_subquery_with_null_check #25954

Closed

  • SqlNullValueException on specific combination of outer joins in LINQ #24931
    6.0.0
  • Query: optimize nullability of the right side of coalesce operation #25950
  • "Argument types do not match" when using ternary operator on Guids in Select statement #23802
    6.0.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Make sure navigations on property bag entity types don't use CLR properties. #25960
  • Delete optional orphans when foreign key value is set to null #25957
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25956
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Always sort deletes before inserts for the same table to avoid deadlocks. #25952
  • Fix to #19883 - Query: null semantics should keep track of columns that are guaranteed to be null and remove redundant IS NULL/ IS NOT NULL checks #25951
  • Query: Add condition when accessing property on optional dependent wh… #25949

Merged

  • Adding regression test for #24931 - SqlNullValueException on specific combination of outer joins in LINQ #25953
  • Switch to R&D pools on main #25944
  • Fixup to index filter validation #25939
